replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content:
neverlag在原帖下载地址中选择 UTF-8编码服务器配置文件bukkit中将spawn-limits中的monsters数量调低
spawn-limits:
  monsters: 40
  animals: 10
  water-animals: 0
  ambient: 0复制代码
